line_1: And then Sutton's blade ran away from its hilt;
line_2: Figg arm'd him again, and they took t' other tilt,

line_1: An' rin her whittle to the hilt,
line_2: An' L — d! if ance they pit her till't,

line_1: An' rin her whittle to the hilt,
An' rin her whittle to the hilt,
line_2: An' durk an' pistol at her belt,
